Why am I Seeing this?


Site is safe

      If you are seeing such a green coloured box, then sit back and relax. The website you are browsing is safe


Site is Not safe

      If you are seeing such a box, then as it says the website you are currently browsing is not safe. You will see such an alert if the url of the webpage you are currently browsing is not an ordinary one. It may be a phishing site. It doesn't means you are attacked, It means that webpage is not suitable for sharing your credentials and money transactions.


WHAT IS PHISHING ??

     Phishing is the fraudulent attempt to obtain sensitive information or data, such as usernames, passwords and credit card details, by disguising oneself as a trustworthy entity in an electronic communication. INTER-POL checks the url and informs you whether the page is safe for confidential transactions.
